name: adminbookmarklet
description: Dynamic Bookmarklet written in pure JavaScript to quickly access the login page of your CMS or E-Commerce system

scripts.minify:wrap: cat adminBookmarklet.min.js | wrap "javascript:!(()=>{" "})();" > tmpfile && cat tmpfile > adminBookmarklet.min.js && rm tmpfile
scripts.minify: yarn run minify:compile && yarn run minify:wrap
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:js && yarn run lint:html
scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run test:unit
scripts.build: yarn run minify && yarn run test && yarn autoclean
